!You must pass individual tests to obtain marks. The *Mark of the Guildsman* is only given to those who pass the Trial of the Guildsman. You must be above *level 35* to take the test. To receive the *Mark of the Guildsman*, go to Giran Castle Town and meet Warehouse Keeper Valkon. The *Mark of Prosperity* is only given to those who pass the Testimony of Prosperity. You must be above *level 37* to take the test. To take the *Testimony of Prosperity*, go to Giran Castle Town and meet Warehouse Keeper Parman. And finally the *Mark of the Maestro* is only given to those who pass the Test of the Maestro. You must be above *level 39* to take the test. To take the Test of the Maestro, visit *First Elder Lockirin* of the Dwarven Village. [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30512/03.htm|Return]Â
